Package it.polimi.is23am10.server.network.playerconnector

Class PlayerConnectorSocket

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.is23am10.server.network.playerconnector.AbstractPlayerConnector
it.polimi.is23am10.server.network.playerconnector.PlayerConnectorSocket
All Implemented Interfaces:
IPlayerConnector, Serializable, Remote
public class PlayerConnectorSocket extends AbstractPlayerConnector
The player connector class definition. This class is responsible to handle clients' sockets connections.

    • notify

      public void notify(AbstractMessage msg) throws InterruptedException
      Notify the player an update. Different delivery strategies are applied based on the AbstractMessage dynamic type. This blocks undefinably until the queue is available (in case socket is used). Game model instances should leverage this queue to send responses to the client (i.e. game updates).
      Specified by:
      notify in class AbstractPlayerConnector
      Parameters:
      msg - The message to be added.
      Throws:
      InterruptedException - On queue message insertion failure.
